narrative.narrative: Starbow are an airline based at Accra,Ghana in West Africa. They have 4 destinations all domestic as of 2014, and do charters to other regional airports. In 2013 their fleet was two BAe 146-300's and a BAe 146-200. They had international scheduled flights within the region but these lasted less than a year from late 2012 to early 2013. Air Shuttle was its name before becoming Starbow in 2011. They started out with two Embraer 110's in 1997.
